sources.title: Dishonored Lady (1947)
sources.description: Art editor Madeleine Damian carries on numerous loveless affairs. After a failed relationship with advertiser Felix Courtland, the increasingly depressed Madeleine attempts suicide. When Jack Garet, her secretary and former lover, tries to blackmail her, Madeleine resigns and seeks a reclusive life. Neighbor David Cousins befriends Madeleine, but soon Courtland and Garet discover her whereabouts and disrupt her new life. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/dishonored-lady-1947/

sources.title: Dishonored Lady
sources.description: You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page .

sources.title: Dishonored Lady
sources.description: Hedy Lamar play fashion editor Madeleine Damien who's social life has given her a quetionalbe reputation. Envitably she succumbs to the pressures of work and a tarnished image and suffers an emotional breakdown. She seeks professional help from a kindly psychiatrist who recommends a complete change in lifestyle.

sources.title: Dishonored Lady (1947) Hedy Lamarr, Dennis O' Keefe, John Loder - Film Noir Full Movie
sources.description: Dishonored Lady is a 1947 American film noir crime film directed by Robert Stevenson and starring Hedy Lamarr, Dennis O'Keefe and John Loder. It is based on the 1930 play Dishonored Lady by Edward Sheldon and Margaret Ayer Barnes. The film is also known as Sins of Madeleine. Hedy Lamarr and John Loder were married when they made this film; but they divorced before the year was out . Wikipedia : https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dishonored_Lady Suggested Film Noirs : http://bit.ly/36oLNCR The Internet Archive is an excellent choice for entire full length Netflix & YouTube style uploads of drama, mystery, thriller & crime noir movies from the UK & USA for free. sources.title: Dishonored Lady (1947) [Drama] [Crime]
sources.description:
"Dishonored Lady" (1947) is a film starring Hedy Lamarr, Dennis O'Keefe, John Loder, William Lundigan, and Natalie Schafer, directed by Robert Stevenson, and released by United Artists. The film is based on the play Dishonored Lady (1930) by Edward Sheldon and Margaret Ayer Barnes.

Madeleine Damien is the fashion editor of a slick Manhattan magazine by day and a lively party girl by night. Unfortunately, the pressures of her job, including kowtowing to a hefty advertiser, and her bad luck with men are driving her to a breakdown. She seeks the help of a psychiatrist, and under his orders, quits her job and moves into a smaller flat under a new identity. She becomes interested in painting and a handsome neighbor. He soon finds out about her past when an ex-suitor implicates her in a murder.

---

Directed by Robert Stevenson, produced by Jack Chertok and Hunt Stromberg, written by 
Edward Sheldon and Margaret Ayer Barnes (play) and Edmund H. North (screenplay), starring Hedy Lamarr as Madeleine Damien, Dennis O'Keefe as Dr. David Cousins, John Loder as Felix Courtland, William Lundigan as Jack Garet, Morris Carnovsky as Dr. Richard Caleb, Natalie Schafer as Ethel Royce, Paul Cavanagh as Victor Kranish, Douglas Dumbrille as District Attorney, Margaret Hamilton as Mrs. Geiger, landlady and Nicholas Joy as Defense Attorney

---

Source: "Dishonored Lady" Wikipedia, The Free Encyclopedia. Wikimedia Foundation, Inc.. 21 June 2012. Web. 6 August 2012. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dishonored_Lady.

If you like this movie and our channel, please subscribe: https://goo.gl/0qDmXe

sources.title: 1947 - Dishonored Lady - With Hedy Lamarr - Unbridled passion... scandal... murder!
sources.description:
When a glamorous editor's wild life leads to a fresh start, a murder accusation threatens to unravel her new love! 
After a personal crisis, fashion maven Madeleine Damien escapes her high-pressure life, finding peace and romance with a devoted scientist. But when a figure from her past meets a tragic end, she's thrust into a courtroom battle to prove her innocence.

Alternative title: Sins of Madeleine (1947) 
Colorized version: https://youtu.be/vFRWiPPAlZw

Director: Robert Stevenson
Writers: Edward Sheldon, Margaret Ayer Barnes, Edmund H. North
Actors: Hedy Lamarr, Dennis O'Keefe, John Loder, Margaret Hamilton

Release date: May 16, 1947
Budget: $1.2 million
Filming location: West Hollywood, California

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUMOycDFnpMeWzaITQSD1dWsOA
